name: Slime World
description:
Hi this game is an overhead shooter, set in a world of slime.  At the moment I have largely completed the engine and would now like to showcase it and see if it can gather any support.  I am simply trying to see if anyone would like this kind of game.

In it you control a guy with a gun can essentially walk round the map and shoot either big or small slimes-exciting right!!!  

If that didn't entice you then listen to this-despite my quick sketches and put together of a map so far there could be a big potential for this game with several levels, bosses and gun types etc

If you like the idea of the game please download it to try it out and later leave a comment on what you think.

Also(about the screen shots) I couldn't get a screenshot of the game as it is in fullscreen mode so I just took a screen shot of one of the sprites.

Thankyou
